com.splunk.logging.log4j2.appender

Class SplunkHECAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.AbstractLifeCycle
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.filter.AbstractFilterable
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.AbstractAppender
          • com.splunk.logging.log4j2.appender.SplunkHECAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Appender, org.apache.logging.log4j.core.filter.Filterable, org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LifeCycle

    @Plugin(name="SplunkHECAppender",
        category="Core",
        elementType="appender",
        printObject=true)
public final class SplunkHECAppender
extends org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.AbstractAppender
